formatted_transcript:
Agent: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

Customer: I am having some battery issues right now

Agent: I'll be happy to help you with that. Could you please provide your registered phone number so I can access your account?

Customer: 1234 567890

Agent: I'll be happy to help you with that. Could you please provide your registered phone number so I can access your account?
